name: Darkrai Prism Star
author: Naoki Saito
flavor_text: It can lull people to sleep and make them dream. It is active during nights of the new moon.

abilities.name: Nightmare Star
abilities.effect: When you play this Pokémon from your hand onto your Bench during your turn, you may attach 2 {D} Energy cards from your hand to it.

attacks.name: Abyssal Sleep
attacks.effect: Your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Asleep. Your opponent flips 2 coins instead of 1 between turns. If either of them is tails, that Pokémon is still Asleep.

rule_box: You can’t have more than 1 Prism Star card with the same name in your deck. If a Prism Star card would go to the discard pile, put it in the Lost Zone instead.
